QuestData.Title: Hold Still
QuestData.Description:
If you want to be a Roughneck, you're going to have to pass a few... trials. Every one of us has done 'em, so I don't want to hear any whining.
Take these clippers and get me some goat fur. You have to clip 'em while they're alive, because thems the rules. Oh, and cover your bits when you do it, they like to kick.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Goat Shears on $1oa Gentle Goats.
QuestData.RewardText: You actually did it! Tell me, how did they like it? Any of 'em give you the horns? Hahaha!
